name: Bwunicluster
tagline: Instructions and hints for work on the bwUniCluster
body:
### bwUniCluster Introduction
This repository is meant to aid you with learning how to navigate on the bwUniCluster and provides you with some basic material for running your jobs in parallel.
The material places emphasis on the `R` programming language and parallelization of jobs using the `mclapply` function from the `parallel` package as well as `GNU parallel`.

It is likely that most of your questions can be answered while browsing the official [project wiki](http://www.bwhpc-c5.de/wiki/index.php/Main_Page), so don't forget to visit it.

### Authors and Contributors
Please feel encouraged to submit pull requests with content such as...

1.  further examples.
2.  best practices.
3.  bug fixes.
4.  other stuff that you can think off.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
